commit.message:
Rollup merge of #33424 - semarie:dist, r=alexcrichton

make dist: specify the archive file as stdout

If the `-f` option isn't given, GNU tar will use environment variable
`TAPE` first, and next use the compiled-in default, which isn't
necessary `stdout` (it is the tape device `/dev/rst0` under OpenBSD for
example).

verification.payload:
tree 9109ede25106d4d5cb9019fcfc1f663154975651
parent 544074eb699f2162d9a1da63346024f3617e7a9b
parent 21117259b096b5e3438bcb0bcb918f8df860c9a1
author Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com> 1462684094 -0700
committer Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com> 1462716016 -0700

Rollup merge of #33424 - semarie:dist, r=alexcrichton

make dist: specify the archive file as stdout

If the `-f` option isn't given, GNU tar will use environment variable
`TAPE` first, and next use the compiled-in default, which isn't
necessary `stdout` (it is the tape device `/dev/rst0` under OpenBSD for
example).

files.patch:
@@ -77,6 +77,7 @@ $(PKG_TAR): $(PKG_FILES)
 	$(Q)mkdir -p tmp/dist/$(PKG_NAME)
 	$(Q)tar \
          -C $(S) \
+         -f - \
          --exclude-vcs \
          --exclude=*~ \
          --exclude=*.pyc \
@@ -86,7 +87,7 @@ $(PKG_TAR): $(PKG_FILES)
          --exclude=*/llvm/test/*/*/*.ll \
          --exclude=*/llvm/test/*/*/*.td \
          --exclude=*/llvm/test/*/*/*.s \
-         -c $(UNROOTED_PKG_FILES) | tar -x -C tmp/dist/$(PKG_NAME)
+         -c $(UNROOTED_PKG_FILES) | tar -x -f - -C tmp/dist/$(PKG_NAME)
 	@$(call E, making $@)
 	$(Q)tar -czf $(PKG_TAR) -C tmp/dist $(PKG_NAME)
 	$(Q)rm -Rf tmp/dist/$(PKG_NAME)
